title: Bluestone National Scenic River: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       New River Gorge National River employs a variety of professional, administrative, technical, clerical, and trade employees. The park workforce consists of about 95 permanent and 35 seasonal employees. Necessary qualifications and wages vary with the type of position and skill required. Employment opportunities are posted: www.usajobs.opm.gov.   For more information on positions at the three national park areas in Southern West Virginia, visit the New River Gorge National River Jobs Page.
